alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Elder County through 500 PM MDT... At 420 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Park Valley, or 26 miles southeast of Oakley Reservoir, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosette. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 36 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
